vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ναθαναήλ, ὁ indecl. (Heb. נְתַנְאֵל),
Nathaniel, prob. to be identified with Bartholomew (which see): Jhn.1:45-49 21:2.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Jhn.1.45
§ Nathanael, "gift of God [El]"
Nathanael, (Proper name), indeclinable, Jn. 1:45-49; 21:2
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿但業 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝的禮物"
耶穌基督的一個親密門徒, 他通常被認為與巴多羅買是同一人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿但业 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝的礼物"
耶稣基督的一个亲密门徒, 他通常被认为与巴多罗买是同一人
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Na-tha-na-ên « Chúa đã ban cho », một môn đồ của Chúa Jêsus. Xem H5417
